name: Flag Fortress
description:
"Welcome astronaut, are you ready for your training?"

"We are searching for a new planet discoverer. You have been selected from many applications, along with a few others. Because we only need one, you will be trained. Then we choose the alien that has preformed the best!"

Flag Fortress is a 2 player local multiplayer platformer. Your goal is to collect the most points.

After you have selected a map, you and your opponent are placed on a castle. One of you starts on the left side, the other on the right. You must try to reach the other castle, grab the flag and return to yours. Then you will get a point!

There are 3 maps, each featuring different enemies and obstacles. If you're new to the game, there is a interactive tutorial available to teach you the basics.

This is my first game, so there can be some little bugs. If you like it, please leave a comment!
